channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 45

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Ah. Makes sense. I guess at the time I thought I would further stabilize my group with the peep, but you're right in that my group is already quite solid. Thanks again for your helpful insight!
item.content:encoded: Ah. Makes sense. I guess at the time I thought I would further stabilize my group with the peep, but you’re right in that my group is already quite solid. Thanks again for your helpful insight!

item.title: By: Spot
item.dc:creator: Spot
item.description: Since you already built some thickness by pressing on the bottom and a solid group on the right, you can simply make another 1 space jump with L11 or even L10 to attack and potentially build the top.
item.content:encoded: Since you already built some thickness by pressing on the bottom and a solid group on the right, you can simply make another 1 space jump with L11 or even L10 to attack and potentially build the top.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Is it the wrong direction because it weakens my R11 group?
item.content:encoded: Is it the wrong direction because it weakens my R11 group?

item.title: By: Spot
item.dc:creator: Spot
item.description: Move 46 is in the wrong direction.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks! Glad you enjoyed it! Your favorite moves are some of mine as well.
item.content:encoded: Thanks! Glad you enjoyed it! Your favorite moves are some of mine as well.

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: This is a great, very detailed, review, i really learned a lot. My favorite moves where: 52, 80, 128 nice :) Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
